alert.note: Alert for Mahoning (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 4:29PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Mahoning County through 530 PM EDT... At 427 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sebring, or near Salem, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Torrential rainfall is also occuring with this thunderstorm with ponding on roadways expected. Locations impacted include... Youngstown, Salem, Columbiana, Boardman, Alliance, Campbell, Canfield, Sebring, Austintown, Struthers, Poland, Ellsworth, New Middletown, Lowellville, Beloit, North Jackson, Berlin Center, Maple Ridge, Greenford and Mineral Ridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
